## ConstantVec2Node class

Constant 2D vector (vec2) value node

**Signature:**

```typescript
declare class ConstantVec2Node extends BaseGraphNode 
```
**Extends:** [BaseGraphNode](doc/markdown/./scene.basegraphnode.md)

## Remarks

Represents a 2-component vector constant (e.g., UV coordinates, 2D positions). Provides multiple output slots: - Output 1: The full vec2 value - Output 2: The x component (swizzle) - Output 3: The y component (swizzle)

Can be exposed as a uniform parameter for runtime modification.

## Example


```typescript
const offset = new ConstantVec2Node();
offset.x = 0.5;
offset.y = 0.5;
offset.isUniform = true;
offset.paramName = 'u_uvOffset';
```
